##################################################################
### Terrain Categories
###
### Terrain types: plains, mountains, hills, desert, artic, forest, jungle, marsh, pti
### Types are used by the game to apply certain bonuses/maluses on movement/combat etc.
###
### Sound types: plains, forest, desert, sea, jungle, mountains

categories =  {
	pti = {
		type = pti
	}

	ocean = {
		color = { 255 255 255 }

		sound_type = sea
		is_water = yes

		movement_cost = 1.0
	}

	inland_ocean = {
		color = { 0 0 200 }

		sound_type = sea
		is_water = yes
		#inland_sea = yes

		movement_cost = 1.0
		
		terrain_override = {
			1364 1365 1366 1367 1368 1369 1370 1371 1393 1394 1395
			1348 1347 1345
			1402 1397
		}
	}	

	glacier = {
		color = { 235 235 235 }

		type = mountains
		sound_type = mountains

		defence = 2
		local_development_cost = 0.55
		local_institution_spread = -0.55
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.75
		movement_cost = 0.8
		local_hostile_movement_speed = 0.25
		
		terrain_override = {
		}
	}

	farmlands = {
		color = { 179 255 64 }

		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.05
		movement_cost = 0.8

			358 359 361 362 363 1689 2315 2316 3453 3454 3455 1683 1681 1682 2310 4300 3428 410 2312 894 890 3425 3427 2480 408 2340 90 168 169 170 171 182 183 893 936 982 1865 2529 3521 3522 3525 172 920 179 927 3913 3526 950 200 2753 1877 192 2527 78 1876 79  3986 64 2957 2955 3984 266 2734 1771 4002 3862 1770 134 112 111 3865 104 1862 109 3866 113 3867 114 2976 3168 118 1744 96 95 98 1857 45 986 1775 44 12 995 2579 238 2010 236 3504 243 151 1792 149 3184 160 3668 789 161 1195 2998 1181 159 3185 3843 153 154 1772 3161 3263 3262 3158 3166 3377 262 4270 3664 257 1415 1427 1184 1756 280 3677 3855 2407 1633 1632 1455 4294 1940 3675 260 3679 284 1636 2410 285 43 1841 38 1600 37 1604 36 1603 855 34 310 33 1961 295 1236 3284 3385 3388 3389 3908 1082 3131 3849

		}
	}

			756 777 1219 784 760 759 1211 1213 1227 1525 1592 2761 2766 2771 2787 2791 2667 2454 335 336 344 346 348 349 502 1751 2459 2462 2463 2464 2465 2468 2913 2915 2916 2917 2918 2921 2925 2928 2929 2937 3698 3733 4081 4098 2470 384 385 386 390 1708 1709 1711 1715 1716 1730 2332 3414 3419 4255 4256 2327 380 381 3408 382 1548 378 3434 3431 886 887 2209 413 3426 3479 4060 4316 2217 3468 324 327 330 332 418 422 424 429 462 646 882 892 901 1164 1166 1244 1657 1723 1808 1856 1902 1922 1923 1987 1988 2196 2202 2203 2205 2210 2211 2213 2222 2223 2234 2301 2303 2305 2482 2483 2486 3308 3432 3437 3438 3466 3467 3469 3472 3474 3477 4299 4301 4302 4303 4309 329 1997 427 433 435 900 903 904 905 906 907 1009 1011 1167 1168 1809 1810 2214 2220 2221 2235 2477 2484 2488 2490 2560 2686 3463 4320 448 450 576 624 978 1008 1968 2007 2225 2494 3481 3696 4307 4315 2020 3697 1169 2023 1202 456 458 4028 1967 455 1201 210 211 926 2987 222 223 226 919 3683 2514 895 3684 102 107 110 128 2979 3175 3877 132 133 199 933 928 2991 202 205 204 3920 120 3870 3169 2986 3500 250 2564 252 2013 971 3247 2563 143 156 158 1766 1827 1951 1952 2856 2864 2950 3221 3265 3312 3373 3887 3917 138 1186 1831 1187 3443 2198 1035 485 22 483 497 835 498 496 494 488 482 578 1925 2070 2128 2596 3190 3618 4311 661 662 675 2165 2166 2167 2545 3990 3994 4107 4128 4129 4132 4160 4169 4171 4172 4175 4179 4180 4183 4188 4191 4192 4195 4196 4200 4204 4205 4210 676 705 706 1248 1482 1483 1486 1493 2001 2134 2170 2182 2184 2562 2651 2654 2665 2673 2701 2703 3066 3067 3193 3341 3342 3651 3991 3996 4000 4005 4103 4104 678 1466 1481 1480 699 1494 2643 2177 1091 1089 2136 74 460 461 710 711 715 925 1071 1803 2368 3345 3776 3830 4018 4063 716 718 1045 1055 1056 2122 2443 2446 2543 3079 3082 3086 3088 3089 3357 4042 4059 4070 3359 2533 2185 3344 3343 4012 714 2731 1068 2190 4061 2431 3071 3092 2363 4024 2743 4124 3007 
		}
	}

	savannah = {
		color = { 248 199 23  }

		sound_type = plains
		type = plains

		local_development_cost = 0.1
		local_institution_spread = -0.1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.0
		movement_cost = 0.8
		
		terrain_override = {
			1226 2932 3724 751 818 834 1095 1120 1123 1131 1135 1136 1137 1142 1143 1148 1149 1150 1155 1157 1159 1160 1531 1544 1802 1914 2002 2025 2240 2243 2244 2245 2248 2250 2253 2259 2264 2265 2266 2267 2268 2269 2270 2273 2278 2280 2281 2283 2285 2286 2287 2803 2804 2812 2833 2834 2843 2844 2846 2852 2861 2863 2866 2867 2870 2892 4178 4218 4221 4228 4231 4232 4236 4242 4245 4246 4247 4250 4251 4252 765 766 1216 1222 1225 2615 2619 2770 2797 2798 2799 2800 3170 3708 3709 3715 3716 3719 3720 3721 3722 3723 3727 3728 3729 3730 3731 3735 1208 1210 2652 2663 2664
		}
	}
	
	steppe = {

		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		local_development_cost = 0.15
		local_institution_spread = -0.15
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.9
		movement_cost = 0.8

			439 443 465 469 471 472 476 934 1197 1797 1798 2351 2359 2366 2478 2528 2559 2671 4009 4321 4322 4323 4324 2370 3770 11 18 20 21 286 288 313 466 467 468 1036 1037 1038 1073 1238 1239 1265 1382 1433 1442 1443 1641 1666 1667 1668 1691 1698 1776 1777 1780 1781 1782 1783 1886 1887 1955 1971 1992 1993 1994 2208 2365 2367 2409 2411 2412 2413 2414 2417 2420 2436 2554 3660 3661 3775 3854 4067 4069 4264 4295 4296 302 303 473 474 1652 1965 2415 2418 2419 2425 2430 2439 2445 2540 2546 2720 2953 3102 3103 3104 3290 3394 3404 3848 3903 478 697 713 720 721 724 1046 1047 1051 1052 1054 1057 1058 1061 1066 1067 1069 1106 1969 2103 2114 2116 2117 2129 2193 2354 2356 2357 2358 2427 2428 2429 2433 2434 2437 2438 2442 2530 2553 2729 2736 2795 3056 3074 3075 3080 3081 3083 3084 3085 3090 3093 3356 3358 3762 3763 3799 3805 3806 3808 3815 3818 3821 3822 3823 3825 3828 4020 4025 4072 4073 4138 4189 701 717 722 723 725 728 1049 1742 1790 1799 2109 2115 2187 3027 3042 3047 3048 3052 3053 3055 3058 3059 3060 3339 3340 3355 3797 3801 3803 3804 3809 3810 3812 3985 4015 4048 4050 1065 
		}
	}

	plains = {

		sound_type = plains

		local_institution_spread = -0.15

			1132 1133 2262 2823 2827 2830 2871 2872 2875 4091 4092 4093 4225 4226 4238 4241 1110 2460 2466 2919 2920 2922 2923 2926 2927 4080 1570 2317 2319 2320 2325 2326 1112 1115 4096 4094 2237 2246 2260 2829 2868 2869 2873 2874 3749 2824 1156 2274 2275 2276 2806 2807 4243 4253 2888 2814 2805 2282 2279 774 785 786 790 791 793 794 795 796 797 1113 2865 1116 4219 347 762 763 764 768 769 772 773 775 776 779 783 1220 1221 2802 3732 3734 3755 3756 3757 3758 3759 3766 3767 3725 1232 2773 3710 2764 2768 1206 1593 1607 2024 2655 2786 2788 3703 2933 345 396 1502 1530 2347 1718 2329 1729 391 1733 1731 1737 2343 1739 1740 3421 2344 1728 395 2341 3422 403 1490 404 1492 1491 1536 364 365 379 405 1543 1552 1553 1554 1690 1692 1693 1854 1855 1696 1695 1694 1697 1545 2314 1680 406 430 896 3952 2219 431 899 2999 1807 428 4304 2216 437 438 444 445 446 453 955 970 1170 1171 1196 1198 1199 1805 1811 1901 2017 2018 2228 2236 2349 2350 2489 2491 2492 2550 2561 2616 3462 3480 3769 4310 4313 4318 575 921 4306 977 3214 2231 2008 2227 3768 2496 2493 4317 2019 442 963 1327 1981 2352 220 221 225 932 1748 1750 2531 2538 2754 3686 3687 503 506 512 515 519 520 521 2051 2052 2053 2054 2058 2064 2066 2079 2087 2088 2503 2505 2508 2512 2598 3216 3217 3218 3219 3220 3222 3593 3594 3617 3638 3639 3641 3644 3645 1467 1496 1497 2180 2181 2647 2649 1484 2441 3829 1080
		}
	}

	taiga = {

		local_institution_spread = -0.25

		terrain_override = {
			312 314 850 851 853 859 860 861 865 866 867 868 869 870 871 872 873 874 1077 1262 1755 1760 1895 1958 1962 1963 1964 2749 2981 3118 3119 3120 3121 3122 3123 3124 3125 3140 3141 3142 3143 3144 3145 3146 3147 3148 3149 3150 3151 3152 3154 3155 3259 3266 3387 3393 3396 3398 3399 3400 3403 3853 3861 3896 3902 3906 3910 4266 4297 2590 1002 10 2589 8 992 4034 4029 9 4027 2585 1001
		}

	}

	valley = {
		color = { 200 40 200 }
		type = hills
		sound_type = mountains

		local_defensiveness = 0.1
		defence = 1

		}
	}

	mesa = {
		color = { 81 43 0 }

		type = mountains
		sound_type = mountains

		local_development_cost = 0.5
		local_defensiveness = 0.25
		defence = 2
		local_institution_spread = -0.5

			2336 1509 392 1510 1725 1511 2328 1522 1720 1721 1097 3471 1649 436 2498 2497 3473 915 3930 2688 913 3929 2232 976 1007 4308 577 3998 2650 1085 2120 3655 2000 707 3087 4022 702 3057 2747 709 1043 4071 3061 480 2189
		}
	}

	oasis = {
		color = { 14 228 232  }	

		type = desert
		sound_type = desert

		local_development_cost = 0.2
		local_institution_spread = -0.2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.9
		movement_cost = 0.8

		terrain_override = {
			2271 2822 2820 2272 2890 2284 801 1158 799 2881 2879 4095 2877 2889 3457 4254 3456 1231 1234 1587 1588 352 2453 2817 2815 2475 2810 4224 2838 2893 2839 2900 3745 2939 2472 2938 2944 3704 2942 2912 2943 393 1520 1521 1523 1526 1527 1532 1537 1686 1687 2337 2338 3409
		}	
	}

	# special
	teleporter = {
		color = { 87 255 100 }

		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		movement_cost = 1.00
		local_hostile_movement_speed = 50
		local_friendly_movement_speed = 50
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 800
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -15
		local_development_cost = 1
		local_warscore_cost_modifier = -0.5
		local_governing_cost = -1
		min_local_autonomy = 100
		local_defensiveness = -0.8
		fort_level = 2
		local_defender_dice_roll_bonus = -2
		
		terrain_override = {
			
		}	
	}
	
}
	
##################################################################
### Graphical terrain
###		type	=	refers to the terrain defined above, "terrain category"'s 
### 	color 	= 	index in bitmap color table (see terrain.bmp)
###

terrain = {
	grasslands			= { type = grasslands		color = { 	0	 } }
	hills				= { type = hills			color = { 	1	 } }
	desert_mountain		= { type = mountain			color = { 	2	 } }
	desert				= { type = desert			color = { 	3	 } }

	plains				= { type = grasslands		color = { 	4	 } }
	terrain_5			= { type = grasslands		color = { 	5	 } }
	mountain			= { type = mountain			color = { 	6	 } }
	desert_mountain_low	= { type = desert			color = { 	7	 } }

	terrain_8			= { type = hills			color = { 	8	 } }
	marsh				= { type = marsh			color = { 	9	 } }
	terrain_10			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	10	 } }
	terrain_11			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	11	 } }

	forest_12			= { type = forest			color = { 	12	 } }
	forest_13			= { type = forest			color = { 	13	 } }
	forest_14			= { type = forest			color = { 	14	 } }
	ocean				= { type = ocean			color = { 	15	 } }

	snow				= { type = mountain 		color = { 	16	 } } # (SPECIAL CASE) Used to identify permanent snow
	inland_ocean_17 	= { type = inland_ocean		color = {	17	 } }

	coastal_desert_18	= { type = coastal_desert	color = { 	19	 } }
	coastline			= { type = coastline		color = { 	35	 } }
	
	savannah			= { type = savannah 		color = {	20	 } }
	drylands			= { type = drylands			color = {	22	 } }
	highlands			= { type = highlands		color = {	23	 } }
	dry_highlands		= { type = highlands		color = {	24	 } }
	
	woods				= { type = woods			color = { 	255	 } }
	jungle				= { type = jungle			color = { 	254	 } }
	
	terrain_21			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	21	 } }	
}

##################################################################
### Tree terrain
###		terrain	=	refers to the terrain tag defined above
### 	color 	= 	index in bitmap color table (see tree.bmp)
###

tree = {
	forest				= { terrain = forest 			color = { 	3 4 6 7 19 20	} }
	woods				= { terrain = woods 			color = { 	2 5 8 18	} }
	jungle				= { terrain = jungle 			color = { 	13 14 15	} }
	palms				= { terrain = desert 			color = { 	12	} }
	savana				= { terrain = grasslands 		color = { 	27 28 29 30	} }
}
